text: Penyrheol, Trecynydd and Energlyn is a community in Caerphilly county borough, part of the town of Caerphilly, South Wales. It includes the areas of Penyrheol, Trecynydd and Energlyn. At the 2011 census the population of the community was 12,537. == References == ==External links== * Community council website Category:Communities in Caerphilly County Borough
title: Penyrheol, Trecenydd and Energlyn
